about.text2: I am a Computer Science student, and my main focus area is full-stack web development with TypeScript.
about.text3: I have developed backend applications in Node.js and C#, using frameworks such as Fastify / Express, and in the Microsoft ecosystem with .NET / ASP.NET. On the frontend, I have worked with React, using Tailwind CSS and Styled Components.
about.text4: Beyond coding itself, I have knowledge in CI/CD with GitHub Actions, Docker, and some design patterns and principles in development.

popUpMessage.sucess: Message Sent! I'll get back to you soon.
